LocationIn: West side 3rd floor.
Details: It's just by the mid stairways in between level 3 & 4. Sejadah is provided and also there is an arrow sign on the ceiling indicating the qiblah direction.

LocationIn: Basement 2 Car park.
Details: You need a visitors pass to enter.

LocationIn: Take fireman lift lobby. Located at B1 near the carpark.
Details:
Fan, telekong and slippers are provided. 
Ablution: use the Handicapped toilet on the 1st floor of Lobby 4.

LocationIn: 4th floor Car park at the extreme end.
Details:
*Off limits on weekend*
A small prayer room for Muslimin and Muslimah  partitioned with a curtain.                  Ablution: go down using the metal staircase.

LocationIn: Go to the main stairs to Level 3.  Then turn left.  The musollah is behind staircase 3.
Details:
Ablution : Go to nearby toilet.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Go to carpark lift 6A.  Then turn left and left again for musollah which is a bit hidden.
Details:
Separate prayer rooms for Muslimin and Muslimah. Ablution : From the lift turn left then go straight. 
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar.
Rooms are well maintained.

LocationIn: (Restricted Place). 4th floor Male locker room.
Details:
(For NS Reservists only). A card is needed to access the glass door to get to the locker room. Ask anyone on the same floor for directions. 
Ablution: use the toilet nearby.

LocationIn: Core K 2nd floor. The door to go down is on 3rd floor next to canteen entrance on the right.
Details: Access to both Musollahs is by Staff ID. Scanning of ID is required to enter the door on the 3rd level and the door entering the locker room. Please seek assistance from the staff available.

LocationIn: Above canteen roof level

Address: CIAS Cargo Centre, 45 Airport Cargo Road, Singapore 819478
LocationIn: Level 2 below the canteen next to the staircase.  The surau is on the left of the entrance.
Details:
Use staircase D to go to the 2nd floor.  
Telekongs are provided. 

Ablution: use toilet at level 3 toilet near the canteen (toilet at level 2 is staff only).

LocationIn: Level 1 Arrival transit West Wing (before immigration clearance).
Transit Mall Level 2 (near Charles & Keith store, behind RMG Clinic)
Transit Mall Level 2 (near Mont Blanc store and Sunglass Hut store).
The Food Court at Level 3M   (Strictly for stallholders).
Details: Try and ask any Muslim stall holder for assistance.

LocationIn:
Take staircase to level 5.                                  

Or level 8 staircase. Both staircases can be used as prayer area.
2nd floor beside the car washing bay within the car park.
Details: Sejadah, songkok and telekung are provided.                   Ablution: inside the room.

LocationIn: Basement 1 car park. Enter the car park and turn RIGHT. It is at the end. There are 2 rooms next to the drivers' rest area.
Details:
Note: musollah is only meant for staff or authorised visitors.

Telekung and slippers are provided. 
Ablution: go down one level. There are 2 gents toilets. For ladies use the LEFT toilet but place a 'Ladies' sign on the door.

LocationIn: Musollah is situated at the 2nd Level.
2nd floor. At the end of the corridor by the ICU ward.
Details: From main lobby take lift to level 2 and turn left. Then make a right where you will see sign for Prayer Room. Sejadah, telekungs, quran and tasbih available.

LocationIn: Level 26. To go to the musollah, obtain a visitors pass at visitors lobby (West wing lobby). Take the lift to level 25 and then the stairs to level 26.
Details: Separate ablution areas for men and women.

LocationIn: Next to Hilton Hotel near the Hard Rock Cafe. Take the lift at the loading bay and go to level 4 (roof-top) before turning RIGHT.
Details:
The room is locked and only the technician has the key to the room.  
Ablution : The room is located next to a tap. Good for 2 people at a time. Items available : Qiblat is marked & sejadahs are available. It is advisable to bring your own telekong for muslimah.

Address:
109 North Bridge Road Spore 179097
(Opposite Central Fire Station)
LocationIn: Basement level.
Details: Ask any Muslim shopowner and they will be able to assist you.

LocationIn: 2nd floor near the toilet at the East Wing. Look for the toilet sign and you will see the 'Prayer Room' sign when you are near the toilet.
Details: Both male and female toilets are nearby for abolution.

LocationIn: Level 1. Go through the main entrance and turn RIGHT along the corridor. Before the toilets there is a staircase. Go up and you will see the musollah.
Details:
The musollah is divided into muslimin and muslimah.  The environment is condusive and clean. The musollah is only for the staff and not public.
Ablution : Can be taken at nearby toilet
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn:
Musollah is for Staff only.

Basement 1 Carpentry + Engineering Workshop. Go to the valet parking booth and you will see a door leading to steps going down to B1.
Details: Get slippers there. The ablution area is upstairs near  the vehicle washing bay / rear entrance of Gordon Grill kitchen. Ask any Muslim staff there for assistance.

LocationIn: Makeshift Fireman's lift landing space as a prayer corner. It is at the RIGHT wing near buffet corner for trainees attending courses at the PSB Academy.
Details:
Quite secure as the lift door is not used unless of emergency. For Qiblat, face the lift door and turn about 20 degrees to the right. There are doors on the left and right. 
Ablution: use toilet on the RIGHT. 
Advice: bring own telekung for Muslimah.

LocationIn: Block A Level 2 (Refreshments Room)
Details: Mats are laid out in the direction of the qiblah and telekong is provided. There is a unisex toilet on the same level. Slippers are also provided and they are placed inside the prayer room itself on a rack behind the door.

LocationIn: Lift Lobby B, Level 2, Staircase exit near toilet. Go down 1 flight of staircase and you will see a door. Enter the musollah.
Details:
Area carpeted courtesy of the Muslim brothers working in the building. 
Ablution: use toilet at 1st floor.

LocationIn: Take the blue lift and go to Level 5.  Then, turn left for the musollah.  There is also another musollah at Level 7 Carpark Lot 113.  The musollah at the far end of the carpark.
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at the nearby toilet located in the lift lobby.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

Address:
10 Scotts Road Spore 228211
12 Scotts Road Spore 228212
LocationIn: Located at the Carpark, next to the entrance from the Carpark.
Details:
Note: Not accessible to public. only for guest and staff.

Toilet (only 1) is available for wudhu, but no slippers.

LocationIn: There are 2 musollahs at the car park area. For Muslimin, the room is underneath the escalator. For Muslimah, the room (former trolley room) is across the loading bay.
Details: Musollahs are equipped with ablution facility and other amenities are provided.

LocationIn: There are 2 very good musollah rooms; one for male and one for female. It's located on the 4th floor near the toilets behind the Ikea Restaurant. It is easy to find as there are signage pointing to the musollah.
Details:
The rooms are well maintained, air-conditioned and carpeted. 
Ablution : Available in the musollah.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

Address:
10 Science Centre Road Spore 609079
12 Science Centre Road Spore 609080
LocationIn: In  Block A  there is one musollah here and the only musollah in this school. The musollah is situated between student service(A01-01) and IPDC service and sale(A01-02).
Details: No partition for Muslimah and Muslimin. Most probably for men only. Ablution: use toilets.

Place: Institute of Public Administration and Management (IPAM) @ Civil Service College
LocationIn: Level 3. The room in IPAM is no longer available. According to the staff, you may use any classroom which is without signage and is unoccupied for prayer.
Details: Note: Kampung Holland Mosque is 5 minutes walk from IPAM if you use the side gate exit.

LocationIn:
Location is at Basement 1 Loading Bay.                
Room is on the RIGHT of the cargo lift.
Details:
Sejadah and slippers are available. 
Ablution: use toilets on 1st or 2nd floor.

LocationIn: 7th Floor car park. The prayer area is near the lift 19/20 at staircase G.  Turn right and you can see a small prayer area.
Details:
Ablution : Toilet at 7th floor.  
Items available : Prayer mats (20), Telekung (8), Slippers (9), Quran (5), Attar (4)

LocationIn: The Musollah at Jurong Point is located at B2 carpark. To get there u have to use the escalator infront of 'Pets Station' head down to B2 carpark and turn left, after 2-3 parking lots you be able to see a room on your left with abolution area outside the room.
Details: The musollah fits 4 person with sejada, telokong, attar provided. There's a remote control to turn on the aircon but please remember to off it after using it. Keys to turn on the tap for abolution is in the musollah hanging beside the door.

LocationIn:
Basement car park. Extreme end of Green Zone area. Car park entrance from Marina Mandarin. The one nearest to CityLink.

Find Manhattan Fish or Lalu or Olio Cafe, go down two floors using escalators next to them.  Exit to your left and you will see a pillar AA3.
Details:
Ablution : There is a specially created ablution area right beside the Musollah.
Items available : Prayer mats), Telekung, Slippers, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Level 4.
Details: Sejadah is provided. Ablution: use toilet nearby.

Address: Caldecott Broadcast Centre, Andrew Road. Spore 299939
LocationIn: Musollah is situated at Level 3 RADIO Building and is next to RIA office.
Details:
The room is labeled 'SURAU'. Kain, telekong and sejadah provided.

The Access door to the surau will be closed from 6pm - 8am from MON - FRI only meant for staff only after the stated time shown

LocationIn: Take the lift after starbuck.  Go to basement 1 car park. Walk to the left, turn right and walk straight.
Details:
It's a makeshift musollah.                     Ablution: Use toilets at upper level before going to basement.
Items available : Prayer mat (15), Telekung (3), Slipper (7), Quran (2), Attar (1)

LocationIn: The new musollah is at Basement 1.                             (The musollah on the 3rd level AHU room has been closed).
Details: Entry to the musollah is by using Staff Pass only. It should not be a problem - ask any Muslim staff and they can direct accordingly. Go via the Multi-purpose hall, turn RIGHT and take the lift to Basement 1.

LocationIn: Take lift to Level 6.
Details: Very spacious plenty of toilets and wudhu for both men and women.

LocationIn: Musollah is situated between Block 2 and Block 3. It is at Basement 1, near the motorcyle parking bay.
Details:
Ablution : Available just outside both male and female musollah.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Situated at the Emergency Ward near the Emergency Entrance. Turn to the RIGHT and go up the staircase. For Muslimin, proceed to the 3rd floor. For Muslimah, proceed to the 4th floor.
Details: Ask any Muslim lady working at the front counter for assistance. Prayer mats are provided but not telekong. Ablution: use the washroom on the ground floor of the Emergency Ward.

LocationIn: Situated at a room on level 6 (Ward 60-64). It is opposite ward 61. It says "quiet room" on the door.
Details:
Prayer mat and telekongs are provided in the cupboard. Qiblat is indicated on the ceiling. 
Ablution: use the washroom or basin in the room.

Address: 5 Arts Link, Block AS7, Level 5, The Shaw Foundation Building, Singapore 117570
LocationIn: The Shaw Foundation Building (AS7). Situated at the staircase landing at level 6.
Details: Take the lift to level 6 before proceeding 1 level up the staircase to get to the musollah. Qibla direction is present. Prayer mats, telekungs, slippers and quran provided

LocationIn: Sports & Recreation Centre. Get directions from General Office.
Details: Room carpeted and sejadah available. No telekong.

LocationIn:
Block A, Level 1 staircase. 
In front of security guards room.(better to ask for assistance).

There are 2 staircases at block E.
Not the one in front of the Student Development Office.

Muslim Students Society (MSS) Clubhouse. Block 71.

You can head down to the first floor and pray at the 'Mambo' room. 

You can ask the security guard for help. Telekong for muslimah is needed.
Details: Telekong for muslimah is  not provided. Required to bring your own.

LocationIn: 3rd Floor car park. Take the lift to the 3rd floor and go through the door that has a music lounge label.
Details: The surau is on the LEFT for both Muslimin and Muslimah. Ablution: use tap at the 'No Washing of car' label.

LocationIn: There is a proper musollah at the North Spine. Situated at Block N2, Level 2 near lift NS2-2.  Turn right after exit from the lift.  Then turn left to the sheltered alley. It's on the right side.
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at nearby toilet.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar
The musollah is accessible by staff and students as access card is required.

LocationIn:
For Muslimah: Go to the Electronic & Electrical Engineering at level B3.  To straight and pass by Luminous lab. Take the Fireman's lift down to Level B5. Exit lift and turn right.  The prayer room is on the left side.  
For Muslimin: Level 2(Roof Top). Use the Passenger Lift from AHU Room S3.
Details:
Ablution : Ablution facilities is provided.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar
The musollah is only accessible by staff and students as an access card is required.

LocationIn: Faculty of science  Microbiology Block (MD4). Situated at the staircase landing at level 5.
Details:
From Science Drive 2 walk straight to Building S10. You will then see direction sign to MD4 that will tell you to take left turn. Then walk towards Microbiology Block (MD4). Turn right when you see Subway Kiosk. Then take the lift at MD4-8 to level 5. Turn right and walk all the way straight to Staircase 1.

Ablution: use the nearby toilets available. Male and female toilets are on alternate floors.

LocationIn: Take the lift from Orchard Hotel (Arcade Shopping Centre) to Basement 2. Turn RIGHT and go down the carpark ramp to Basement 3. You will see a washing area and next to it is the musollah.
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken outside the room at the washing area or in the toilet. The room is partitioned into Muslimin and Muslimah sections. 
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Kain pelikats, Quran and attar

LocationIn: Opposite Orchard Hotel.  Located at the 5th floor.  Take the lift at the carpark then turn right you can see a black door.
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at nearby toilet.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Basement floor.
Details: Ask the Indian shop owner.

LocationIn: Situated at staircase landing.  Proceed to exit opposite shop B1-08. Musollah is on the right.  There are 3 levels of praying area and is spacious.
Details:
Ablution : Can use the toilet nearby or the washing basin/area. 
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

Address: 90 Lorong K Telok Kurau, Singapore 425723 (Off Still Road)

LocationIn:
[Only for staff]

Far end of Spring Singapore building.

Take the lift to level C which is a carpark area. 

Walk straight ahead and use the exit staircase and ascend to the highest level (Level 4 is the highest)where you will find a row of seats at your right side.

Walk straight, turn left and you will find a door that says 'Only for Staff'.

Turn left and you will find the Observation door. 

Enter it and you will find 2 prayer rooms, 1 for female and 1 for male.
Details:
There is a toilet outside the observation room for ablution.

If you get lost, go to the reception counter at level 1 and a malay security guard will gladly help you.

LocationIn: 2nd floor near the toilet. Access through the Exit door.
Details: There are taps inside for ablution.

Address: 60 Woodlands Industrial Park D Street 2 S(738406)
LocationIn: For Muslimin only. Fab 6, Level 2. Along Sub Fab corridor. Staircase nearest to the male toilet.
Details: Ablution to be taken at male toilet.

LocationIn: Level 1 Carpark, staircase 4. Situated at Block A. Walk down to the end of the tunnel from the bus stop at Alexandra Road to Alexandra Technopark's car park. Inside the car park, to your RIGHT, there is a Chinese altar. Opposite it, there is a small room under the stairwell hidden by a curtain which is the musollah.
Details: For ablution : To be taken using the tap, one level up the stairs. Slippers available but muslimah have to bring their own telekong.

LocationIn: Take the lift from the lobby at Tower 2 (next to Golden Shoe Car Park) to 2nd Floor and turn RIGHT.
Details: For MEN Only. Slippers and a fan are provided. Ablution: use the tap outside the men's toilet nearby.

LocationIn: Basement 3 Car Park.  Surau near pillar 3G and 2H.  Take escalator beside starbuck to get to the carpark.
Details:
Ablution: For Muslimin, it's provided.  For Muslimah, it is advisable to do it in the toilets at ground floor.
Items available : Prayer mats, Slippers, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Car park basement 4. There are 2 small prayer rooms located beside the washroom. Please take the car park lift from the lobby.  The rooms are air-conditioned
Details:
Ablution : Toilets nearby
Items available : Prayer mats (5), Telekung (2), Slippers (3)
For Muslimah: Core 5C & 6E.                            For Muslimin: Core 3D & 5E                             (opposite Staff Travel).                                  All Amenities available

Address: NTUC Income Tampines Point, 2 Tampines Central 6, Singapore 529483
LocationIn: Level 8F extreme right.
Details: Strictly for SIA staff Only                           All amenities available.  For info please call Duty SRO  Tel: 6507133

LocationIn: Ground Floor. After security check, turn RIGHT to the end, near the Ladies toilet.
Details: Staggered time for Muslimah & Muslimin. Please check with security.

LocationIn: The surau is located behind newly-renovated Housemen Canteen
Details: The surau (formerly known as Surau MacAlister) has been renovated.  It is very convenient for visitors who have afternoon appointments in the hospital. Solat Jumaat is held in this surau.  If you have any problem please seek assistance from any MOH muslim.

LocationIn: Block A at Staircase 24, next to Lecture Room 1.17 on the ground floor
Details: It is maintaied by SIMCMS. Slippers, telekung, kain and prayer mats are all available for use. For ablution, please use the toilet nearby on the same ground floor as the Musollah.

LocationIn: Situated at level 2.
Details:
Ablution : can be taken in the musollah room or at the toilets nearby.
Prayer mat and telekongs provided.

LocationIn: There is an official prayer room at the Lower Basement. Take the lift beside 7-Eleven outlet at the Concourse B1 down to Lower Basement and turn right.
Details: Access card is required - thus the room is only available to students and visitors with visitors pass.

LocationIn: The surau for Muslimin & Muslimah is on the second floor. From the hotel entrance, go RIGHT to the Gents & Ladies' Restrooms next to the Lift. Go upstairs to the car park.
Details:
A shoe rack is provided inside. 
Ablution: For Muslimin, it is next to it. For Muslimah, turn LEFT just outside the prayer area.
Items available : Prayer mats (4), Telekung (4), Slippers (1), Quran (3), Attar (3)

LocationIn: Building T5. Situated at the staircase landing on Level 3.
Details:
Take the staircase nearest to the Library and Administration Block. 
Both Gents and Ladies' toilets are available at Level 3.
Qiblat direction, sejadahs, telekongs, slippers, quran are available.

LocationIn: Building T14. Situated at the staircase landing at Level 8.
Details: The mushollah is located at the staircase landing with one at each end of the building. Qiblat, sejadahs, telekongs, quran and slippers are provided. Ablution is to be taken at the toilets on level 7 as the toilets on level 8 are only for use by staff.

LocationIn: Building T18. Situated at the staircase landing between Level 6 and 7, at the far end of the building.
Details:
Take lift to level 6 then walk to the opposite side of the corridor and take the stairs up from there.

Qiblat, sejadahs and telekongs, quran, slippers, sarongs are provided. Ablution is to be taken at the toilet on the same level.

LocationIn: Singapore Polytechnic Malay Language Society (SPMLS) Room. Building FC 5.
Details: The Singapore Polytechnic Malay Language Society room is available for fellow muslims to pray there. Amenities are all provided.

LocationIn: (Omni-Theatre Building) Past the ticketing counter and walk to the Omni-Theatre entrance queuing bar and turn LEFT to the staircase.
Details: Prayer mats available.

LocationIn: A spacious room at the Loading/Unloading Bay. Beside the Trams parking area near the entrance. (Please ask permission as the musollah is for staff only)
Details: Telekongs available. Ablution place is at the back of the room. Please ask the Muslim Tram drivers for actual directions.

LocationIn: Basement 1 Car park. Take lift number 10 down to level B1.Take left exit from the lift to enter carpark. While facing carpark turn left twice.
Details:
Musollah is part of parking lot and is closed at 8pm. Wudhu area cant be found at the corner of the carpark.
Prayer mats, telekungs, slippers and quran available for usage.

LocationIn: Musollah is at Basement 1 Car park near the car park exit beside the cleaners' store.
Details: It is well maintained by the staff. Telekongs available. Ablution: use tap near the cleaners store. The allen-key for the tap is kept inside the musollah. Visitors can ask the car park staff or any SP Muslim staff for direction. Musollah also open on weekends.

LocationIn: Staircase landing between 1st and 2nd floor side entrance facing Parliament House.
Basement 1; proceed to toilet area near staff entrance and you will find musollah situated next to the pantry.
Details: Ablution can be taken outside the room. Sejadahs, kain pelekat, quran, radio and clock provided. Max only 2 person in the room.

LocationIn: Turn in to corridor leading to the toilet located next to Blush shop at level 2
Details:
Enough for 2 to 3 people at once

Alternative prayer space can also be found across musollah next to service lift area which can be identified by musollah sticker pasted on floor

Ablution : Go to toilet or the sink nearby.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Quiet corner behind Arts block, in front of container classrooms.
Details: For both Muslimin and Muslimahs. Wudhu can be taken at nearby male & female toilets. Slippers, telekong & sejadah available. Kiblat direction not indicated. Best to ask Malay security guard first

Address: 1 Woodlands Industrial Park D Street 1 Spore 738799
LocationIn: Prayer Rooms : Fab 1 & Fab 2 Common Locker Changing room cubicles.
Details: Wuduk can be easily taken in the lavatories with cubicles. The cubicle has a wash basin.

LocationIn: Level 3. To the right of the entrance of Federal Express Office.
Details:
The room is shared by Muslimin and Muslimah in turns by placing the sign indicator.
Take lift from Lobby A to the 3rd level then head towards Fedex office and make a right turn where you will see 'Tenant Riser' room which is the musollah.

Sejadah, songkok, telekung and radio are available.   Ablution: use the Cleaners Room which is on the right of the passage way leading to the toilet.

Address: (Formerly known as Temasek Tower) 8 Shenton Way Singapore 068811
LocationIn: Staircase 5, closer to Yellow Zone (ramp upwards from B3) -> corridor towards office lifts (under the stairs)
Details:
Ablution : to be taken at the toilet nearby. 
Items available : Praying mats, telekung, slippers, Quran and attar are available.

LocationIn: Located at staircase 2 on 3rd floor.  Situated near shop #03-44 under Emergency Exit staircase
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at nearby toilet near the escalator.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: There is a designated place for solat at the 6th floor.  To use lift lobby C and turn right after the toilet.
Details:
A separate room for Muslimin and Muslimah. 
Ablution : Can be taken at nearby toilet.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar. Very comfortable place insyaAllah.

Address:
20 Collyer Quay, Spore 049319
(Along HSBC Raffles Place)
LocationIn: Musollah at B1 car park.                               Take lift to basement.
Details: Ablution in toilets at staircase. Telekongs and slippers available. Ask Security for assistance.

LocationIn: Situated at the Motorcycle Training Reporting Centre.
Details:
About 7 people can fit in at once. For ablution, use the toilet nearby. Alternatively for males, you may ask any muslim staff for key to the water pipe located by the side of the reporting area to take wudhu.
Sejadahs, telekungs, prayer mats and slippers are provided.

Address:
101 Thomson Road,
United Square Shopping Mall,
Spore 307591
LocationIn: Go to car park lift 13 or 14.  Then go to level 5A and walk straight on exit and turn right at ramp.  Musollah is located near car park lot 77/78 near white generators.
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at toilets on level 3 or 4.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: 7th Floor car park (staircase landing).
Details:
Take Cargo Lift to 7th Floor. Proceed left towards the cooling tower. Take the pathway around the tower which will eventually lead to the staircase landing (converted to musholla).          
Sejadah, telekong, kain and songkok are available. Ablution: use the tap there.

LocationIn: 3rd floor, outside the AVA Room (look for the back door).
Details: Zhuhr and Asr prayers. For Zhuhr prayers:1.30pm on Mondays. 1.30pm or 2.30pm on Tuesdays to Thursdays. For Asr prayers: Monday to Friday during Asr. Ablution is taken at water cooler or toilet.

LocationIn: There is a canteen next to the main gate. Proceed to the canteen and go all the way in until you see the '10 cents' toilet on your right. There is a surau nearby.

Address: 41 Dunlop Street Spore 209369 (Near Sim Lim Square)
2 Lorong Sarhad Singapore 119173 (Off West Coast Highway)
15 Jalan Ulu Seletar Spore 769227 (Near Nee Soon Camp)
192 Telok Ayer Street Spore 068635 (Near Tanjong Pagar MRT)
11 Jalan Ibadat Spore 698955 (Near Army Logistics Base)
34 Jalan Haji Alias Spore 268534 (Off Sixth Avenue)
66 Pheng Geck Avenue Singapore 348261 (Near Potong Pasir MRT)
550 Yung An Road Spore 618617 (Off Corporation Road)
2 Lewis Road Spore 258590 (Opposite Copthorne Orchid Hotel)
39 Hill Street Spore 179364 (Near City Hall MRT)
LocationIn: Entrance to the mosque is by the car park near capitol building.

Address: 37 Palmer Road Spore 079424 (Off Keppel Road, near Marina House)
2 Hillside Drive Spore 548920 (Off Upper Serangoon Road)
76 Kim Keat Road Spore 328835 (Opp NKF Centre)

LocationIn: At the traffic light along Portsdown Ave, turn right into Jalan Hang Jebat. Proceed all the way along the road and you will come to the end of the road where the mosque is located.

Address: 441B Jalan Mashhor Spore 299173 (Near Singapore Polo Club)
11 Lim Chu Kang Road Spore 719452 (Near the Muslim Cemetary)
46 Bristol Road Spore 219852 (Near Farrer Park Tennis Centre)

LocationIn:
(For muslimah only).
Situated at a staircase landing on level 7.
Details:
Take the lift nearest to the Pavilion Cafe.
Prayer mats, telekungs, slippers, quran and attar available.

Address:
4 Architecture Drive Spore 117566 
School of Design & Environment 3 (SDE 3)
LocationIn: For muslimin & muslimah. Situated at a staircase landing on level 4, opposite room LR427.
Details: Ablution : To be taken at the toilets nearby.

LocationIn:
(For muslimin only).
Situated below the entrance of Central Library.
Details:
Take the lift to level 4. Then take stairs closest to the bookdrop slot outside the library, one level down.

Ablution : to be taken at the toilets nearby. Slippers, sejadah and kain provided.

LocationIn:
(For muslimin only).
Situated at a staircase landing on level 6. Take the lift labeled AS3-1 which is on the RIGHT.

(For muslimah only).
Situated at a staircase landing on level 7.

(For muslimah only).
Situated at a staircase landing on level 5. Take the lift which is nearest to Lecture Theatre 15(LT 15).

(For muslimin only).
Situated at a staircase landing on level 6.
Details:
From lift landing, turn right then turn right again on the first turn, then straight all the way down before another left turn.
Prayer mats, kain sarongs, slippers, quran and attar available.
Ablution : to be taken at the toilet nearby.

LocationIn:
(For muslimah only).
Situated at staircase landing on level 4.
Details: Prayer Mats, Telekungs, Slippers, Quran and attar available.

LocationIn: Situated at a staircase landing on level 6. Take the lift up to level 6 and walk all the way up the stairs.
Details: Ablution : can be taken using the tap outside, when you go out the door next to the musollah. Alternatively, the toilets nearby can also be used. Alternate levels have particular toilets for gents and ladies.

LocationIn: Take the lift from the main entrance. Go up to level 4. Upon exiting the nearest door, turn LEFT and proceed all the way to the staircase at the end. Walk all the way up to the musollah which is at the staircase landing.
Details:
Sejadah, kain and telekong provided. Qiblat is 10 degrees to your right when you are facing the door.
Ablution : to be taken at the toilet which is next to the office at level 4

LocationIn: Situated at a staircase landing on level 6. Take the lift labeled MD3-1 up to the musollah.
Details:
Take walkway towards MD-3 and take right turn at the end of it. Then take lift to level 6, turng right upon exit and walk up to staircase landing.

Ablution : to be taken at one of the toilets nearby. Slippers, sejadah, telekong and kain provided.

LocationIn: Carpark Basement 2
Details: 2 places and sejadah available. No telekong. Ablution to be taken at the several toilets in the office building. A visitor pass is required for entry.

LocationIn: Musollah is located inside the restaurant. Ask permission to use.
Details: Sejadahs, telekungs, prayer mats and quran provided.

LocationIn:
Located at the end of Hall 6 @ Level 2 

Can be viewed from the Carpark.
Details: Wudhu can be taken at nearby toilets and slippers are available.

LocationIn: Level 6 Engineering School Block 22.
Details:
Walk down to concourse to Lobby 4. Take lift to level 6, look for Block 22 entrance and walk straight in where you will see EXIT sign. Musollah is behind that exit door.
Prayer mats, telekung, slippers and quran available.

LocationIn: Level 8 Engineering School Blk 19
Details:
Walk down to concourse lobby G. Take lift to level 8. Enter the lab through two big doors and walk straight till you see the exit door where the musollah is.
Sejadah, Telekung, Kain pelekat, Slippers are all provided.

LocationIn: Women's Wing - Staircase landing 23 (behind Exit door) just left of the 24-hour Clinic at Basement 1. Go up the staircase. It's between level 1 & B1.
Details: Slippers, mats and telekong available. Take ablution at Basement 1 male/female toilets nearby.

LocationIn:
On the staircase landing between 2nd & 3rd floor.
On the staircase landing between 4th & 5th floor.
Details:
The staircase landing between 2nd & 3rd floor is for muslimin.
The staircase landing between 4th & 5th floor is for both muslimin & muslimah.
Ablution : Can be taken at the toilets available on all floors. 
Items available : Prayer mats, Kain Pelikat, Slippers, quran, Attar.  It is better to ask the security officers on the ground floor for directions and permission.

Place: Singapore Institute of Management (SIM) Management House
LocationIn: Level 6, Staircase
Departure Area. Turn left after checking-in and immigration clearance. There's a sign indicating 'Prayer Room' at the departure area.
Details: Qiblat direction, prayer mats and ablution area provided.

LocationIn: Before entering Woodlands library, there is a door to the right. Musollah is just straight ahead at level 1. This praying area can fit about 3 people at once.  For bigger congregation, after entering the first door, there is a door on the right.  Proceed to staircase level 2 in the same area. This praying area can fit about 10 to 15 people at once.  A replica of a sajadah with foot-marks and qiblat infront of it is there to indicate the prayer place.
Details:
Ablutions : Should be taken in the toilets of the upper levels of the building or the toilet inside the library near Cafe Galilee. 
Items available : Prayer mats (7), Telekung (10), Slippers (4), Quran (1), Kain Pelikat (1).  Level 2 - Prayer mats (11), Telekung (9), Slippers (1), Kain pelikat (5)

Address: 1 Hon Sui Sen Drive, Singapore 117588 (Hon Sui Sen Memorial Library)
LocationIn: Near Hon Sui Sen Library main entrance, there is a toilet. Take the staircase next to the toilet all the way to the top to get to the Musollah.
Details: You have to take wudhu at the toilet near Hon Sui Sen Library

LocationIn:
- Between Level 8 and 9
- Between Level 9 and roof

Both at staircase landing
Details:
Only shows the Qiblat.

Need to bring own solat materials, e.g. tudong, sejadah, etc Wudhu' can be taken from toilet on either floors (8 or 9)

LocationIn: The Surau is on the 3rd Floor (Venus Ballroom), same direction towards the toilet.  The surau is at the end of the corridor.
Details:
Ablution : A small wash area facility available. Need no slipper. Small Space enough for only two at a time(but quite squeezy). 
Items available : Prayer mats, telekong, Quran, Attar.

LocationIn:
(Temporary) Next to Annual Pass counter.
Ask any of the staff inside the Annual Pass counter and they will direct you to a room.
Details:
The room is not fully ready but it is comfortable and you will need to bring your own sejadah and telekong. You can take your wudhu at the nearest toilet.

Can accommodate up to 10 people

LocationIn: Void Deck
Details: The last void deck surau in Singapore. Fully equipped facilities with wudhu' area and sejadah.

Address: 151 Compassvale Bow Spore 544997 (Nearest MRT station - Buangkok)

LocationIn: Level 4. Inside Male and Female Locker Room.
Details:
A very small but spacious room inside the Male Locker Room. Enough for 15 People at a time. Necessary equipments are available. Just ask any Muslim or Non-Muslim Staff for direction to the Musollah
PS: Area is accessible by Airport Pass only.

LocationIn: There is an open area below the 'makan' place. Head to the toilet with the vending machines beside it. Then head up the stairs. The musollah is on level 2.
Details: Telekongs are provided. Ablution to be taken at the toilets below.

LocationIn: Behind Boon Tat Seafood at Asli Village.
Details: Separate rooms for male and female. Take wudhu' at the nearby toilet.

Address: Beach Station, Siloso Beach(Near the Luge)
LocationIn:
Basement 1 Carpark yellow zone area (next to lot 198) near the escalator.

Get off at beach station if coming from the train. Opposite the information counter there is escalator going to basement 1. Turn right and the prayer rooms are there for gents and ladies.
Details:
If you are walking on foot look out for Coffee Bean as the said carpark is located beneath it.
There are directional signs to the musollah. Ablution can be taken at a nearby water point just to the right of the musollah.

Opens from 9am-9pm. Help yourself to the lights and the fans switches.

Address: 21 Lower Kent Ridge Road Singapore 119077 (University Hall)
LocationIn: Enter Tan Chin Tuat wing building. At the lift lobby, turn left and go straight. Turn right and enter through the wooden door, past the lift, enter another wooden door and  you shall see a musollah set up by the guards, with clean toilets nearby for ablution.
Details: Air-conditioned, clean and comfortable.

LocationIn: Level 7 and 8 of Applied Science Block 7 Building.
Details:
Level 7 is only for Muslimah
Level 8 is open to both Muslimin and Muslimah.
Prayer Mats, Telekungs, Kain pelekat, Slippers and Quran provided.

LocationIn: Entrance of Swissotel walk straight. Take the escalator to 2nd floor of Raffles City Shopping Centre. Then walk past the aisle between G2000 and Warehouse Stores.
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at the toilet opposite Asian Market Cafe.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Block W1, Level 2.
(For muslimin only). Situated at a staircase landing next to Dean's office on level 7
Details: Take the lift near to Engineering Auditorium.

LocationIn: Musollah found in between Revenge of the Mummy and Battlestar Galactica Human(red).
Details: The room is small but it's air-conditioned. Place making wudu' is available inside and prayer mats are already provided.

LocationIn: 2nd Floor, Gedung Butik (Inside shop -3rooms available near cashier) (For public use as stated outside shop)
Details: Prayer mats, attire and qiblat available.

Address: 1000 Toa Payoh North, News Centre, Singapore 318994
LocationIn:
Take the lift at Annexe Block and go up to Level 3. Upon exiting the lift, turn left and you'll see a signboard saying "Prayer Room".

There's a separate prayer room for Muslimin (Male) & Muslimah (Female).
Details:
Sejadah, telekung are provided.

Ablution are for Muslimin is outside the prayer room, ablution area for Muslimah is inside the Muslimah prayer room.

Building access is only for staff and invited guests (events, journalists's invitees, etc). Outsiders need staff's assistance to enter the building.

LocationIn: Main Building. Take the Lift and go to 2nd Floor. Walk towards Coldwell Banker office and turn left at a corridor. Look for "Grange" room. It has white paper covering the translucent part of the door.
Details: Ablution can be taken at the 2nd floor toilets. Sejadah & Telekong & Quran are provided. If you are not sure of the location please call: Ahmad Ibrahim @94592099

LocationIn:
Basement carpark, near
motobike parking area, behind Staircase 4 door.
Details:
Wudhu' can be taken from toilets situated to the left of the cargo/fireman's lift.
Sejadahs and slippers are available.

LocationIn: Basement 1 of Tower 2. Beside staircase.
Details: Do note there are two towers. Pls proceed to Tower 2, Basement 1. Go by Cargo Lift. Musollah near to the staircase. Slippers, prayer mats available. Ablution to be taken at level 1 toilet near the cargo lift.

LocationIn: Carpark Level 3. Corner of open space. Take lift from carpark lift lobby near taxi stand. Take right exit from the lift then make another right turn and walk down where you will eventually see the prayer room to your left.
Details:
Open space. Not so suitable for female.

Water/tap available at washing area carpark level 3. Sejadah and slippers available too.

Female toilet can be found at carpark level 2.

Place: National University of Singapore University Town (U Town)
LocationIn: Education Resource Centre (ERC) 2nd Floor Staircase 3 Near the Toilet.
Details: Solat necessities such as telekung, sajadah, kain pelekat and attar are provided. Slippers for ablution are available. Qibla direction is displayed.

LocationIn: At basement 1 near valet parking counter, below Fairprice

Address: 1 Vista Exchange Green, The Star Vista, Singapore 138617
LocationIn:
Staircase
Lvl b1 smoke stop lobby
Details: Just an empty area. Bring own compass, prayer mats and attire. Wuduk can be taken in the toilet beside lift.

LocationIn:
The prayer areas for both male and female are now available. Both are carpeted.

Male: on the left of lobby B goods lift, basement 1. Ablution area at loading and unloading bay nearby.

Female: Lobby B, Level 2, at staircase Stair 3. Near the toilets.  Need to pass 2 doors to the prayer area at a staircase landing. 

Ablution at female toilet. Water spray available for washing legs.
Details: Available prayer mats, qiblat directions and nearby ablution area.

LocationIn: Level 6 & 8

- Level 6, cleaner's quarters
- Take Fireman's Lift to Level 6, turn right when exit from lift, head out, and locate staircase
- Musollah is located on the landing of the level 6 staircase
Details:
Ablution : Can be taken at nearby toilet.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Take the cargo lift to level 8 and turn left. Proceed to the end of carpark and find rest area. Musollah situated near carpark lot number 86 to 87.
Details: For both guys and girls. Musollah equipped with wall fan and storage cabinet where one can find prayer mats and telekungs available.

LocationIn: Level 4 outside Music Room(Back Door)
Details: Zhuhr and Asr prayers on weekdays. For Zhuhr prayers:1.30 pm on Mondays, 1.30pm or 2.30pm on Tuesdays to Thursdays. For Asr prayers:Mondays to Fridays during Asr. Ablution is taken at toilet. Prayer mats are taken from the nearest window of class 4E2 at level 4. The prayer mats are actually in the inside of the classroom where it is placed on the chair. Qibla directions is found on the floor outside the music room.

LocationIn: Level 5, staircase L.5
Level 6, staircase H.1
Details: Telekungs, qurans, sejadahs, songkok, pelekat.

Address: 10 Pasir Panjang Road, Mapletree Business City Singapore 117438
LocationIn:
20 West
Basement 1 motorcycle carpark, below cafeteria
Details: Male and female sections, ablution at toilet upstairs level 1

LocationIn:
This location is the main musollah location for NP students.
This is located below the staircase near the lift lobby. The location is at the basement level. The main entrance is located near the Block 56 carpark,directly opposite the motorcycle carpark.When you enter, it is located on the right.
Toilet is nearby the musollah, enter the door in front of the lift lobby and turn left.
Details:
Slippers,sejadah and telekong provided. It is stored in the 2 "cabinet" which you will see when you enter the CC from the entrance mentioned above.

Note: Please do take the ablution at the toilet for the disable, between the male and female toilet. Reason is the female indian cleaner does not want us to wet the other toilets, making her job even harder. Do cooperate, thanks!

LocationIn: Shared CCA Storeroom under canteen. Coming in from the side gate, go up the stairs towards the canteen. Before reaching the canteen, turn to the right and walk up. There will be 3 rooms and a door. The musollah is in the room on the right.
Details:
Ablution can be taken in the toilets 1 floor below (next to the Gym).

Slippers, prayer mats & telekung provided. Qiblat indicated by an arrow on the floor.

Lights in the room do not work, switch on the lights outside if needed.

LocationIn: Take lift at back entrance of the building. Go up to the third floor. Turn right after exiting lift. There's an unmarked door at the lift lobby next to the goods lift. The musollah is behind that door. Just a small room. Max 3 persons can pray at any one time.
Details:
Visitors need permission from security guard to enter musollah. 
Prayer mats, telekong, fan available. If you're already standing in the musollah, Qiblat is 90 degrees right from the door.

Approach any muslim staff for any available toilets to take wudhu'as access pass is required to enter the toilets.

LocationIn: Corners of basement carpark. (Women's- A room near motorcycle parking lot, Men's-opposite corner described for women's musollah.)
Details: Prayer mats, attire & qiblat directions available.

LocationIn: 10th floor. Stairway landing beside the toilet. Sejadah and Telekung available but only accessible by staff.
Enter the technology block and turn left to the toilet area then enter the staircase and go down the steps there is a door there and turn right.
Details: Prayer mats and the qiblat direction are available

LocationIn: Located on the 1st floor near A&E and Admissions Office, beside Guardian Pharmacy near the toilet.
Details:
Separate Prayer Rooms for Male & Female.
Ablution : Wudhu-taking facilities are available in each room. 
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Surau is located beside the canteen. Door clearly marked with 'surau'.
Details:
Only for personnel in camp. Not accessible to public.

Sejadah available.

LocationIn: At the back of Charcos (provided by Charcos) Small white tentage
Details: The Musollah is for the public use provided by Charcos. Fit for one person at time.

LocationIn: Level 2. Behind LT3 where the cleaners rest.
Situated on 2nd floor of restaurant itself.  To ask for permission from staff to access to the musollah.
Details:
Ablution : Available but for (hijab-wearing muslimah need to take their ablution at the food market public toilet. Prayer room is for Spize employee but customers may ask for permission from any of the employee.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

Place: Makan Bagus Coffeehouse @ Tampines Circle Market
Address:
Makan Bagus Coffeehouse
Blk 138 Tampines St 11
Singapore 521138
LocationIn: Located right next to the restrooms at the handicap toilet.
Details:
Enough space for 1 or 2 persons. 
Ablution : There is a common sink but it is advisable to take at the toilet itself.
Items available : Prayer mats, Telekung, Quran, Attar

Place: Suntec City / Millenia Walk - Centennial Tower
LocationIn: Located at B1 car park next to parking bays 28-29 (Red). Easy access from Suntec Towers from entrance to Car park under Millenia Walk entrance (opp tower 4)
Details:
Jamat is conducted at Zohor, Asar and Maghrib on weekdays within 5 minutes of Azan. Ablution : Can be taken at pillar to the left of the musollah.
Items available : Prayer mats (30), Telekung (12), Slipper (13), Quran (7), Attar (4)

LocationIn: Staircase behind (not the staircase at lift lobby).
Details: Prayer mats provided.

LocationIn: A small room behind reception counter at entrance. Refer to staff for directions as the room can only be entered with a pass code.
Details: Qiblat and prayer mats available. Ablution to be taken at nearby toilets.

LocationIn:
For Staff Only 

Level 1, opposite the staff lockers and beside Staircase 12.
Details: Sejadahs aplenty. For ladies, bring your own telekung.

LocationIn: Male Musollah. Located at Level 2 Nanyang Business School.  Opposite lift S3-1 and S3-2.
Details:
Ablution : Available outside the room.
Items available : Prayer mats, Quran, Attar

LocationIn: Level 6 of Applied Science Building Blk 1
Details:
Walk to concourse lobby A. Take lift up to level 6.
Walk through computer labs and head towards exit where the musollah is.
Sejadah, Telekungs, Prayer Mats, Slippers and Quran available.

LocationIn: Building T16. Situated at the staircase landing between Level 7 and 8.
Details:
Take the lift to level 7 and turn right upon exit. Then take the stairs up to the musollah.
Sejadahs, telekongs, kain sarongs and slippers are provided.

Place: Nanyang Technological University (NTU) School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering South Spine (Female)
LocationIn: Go to School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering at level B3. Go straight and pass by Luminous Lab. Take the Fireman's lift down to Level B5. Exit lift and turn right. The prayer room is on the left side.
Details:
Entry requires NTU access card.
Ablution point available within the room.
Prayer mats, telekung, copies of the Quran available.

LocationIn: Blk N3 or N4 (need confirmation) Level 2 (roof top)
Details:
Ablution area just behind the musolla.
Slippers for ablution, prayer mats, kain pelekat, attar, copies of the Quran and fan available.

Place: Nanyang Technological University (NTU) School of Physical and Mathematical Sciences (SPMS)
LocationIn: School of Physical and Mathematical Sciences (SPMS). Find for SPMS-LT1. Prayer room is just to the right of the lecture theatre.
Details:
Prayer room is for both male and female use.
No ablution area but toilet can be found at the entrance.
Slippers for ablution, prayer mats, telekung and songkok available.

LocationIn: Level 3, Science garden, at technical block
Details: Go inside the science garden. The OSO staff will direct you to the location. Ablution area is provided and also sejadah. The qiblat also shown.

LocationIn: Located at the 5th level of the building (small room with signage displayed) opposite room 5c
Details:
Please bring along your own compass as there is no kiblat direction indicated.

Toilet is available for taking wudhu and both prayer mats and slipper are provided there.

LocationIn: At the end of level 6 towards classroom #06-06.
Details:
Ablution area: Handicapped toilet with tap at the bottom sink that is convenient to take ablution.
Toilet can be found near the lift

Praying materials: Open the door nearest to the wall at the end. Prayer mats and attire and be found in a white box

Qiblat directions: Look for the qiblat direction pasted on the floor

LocationIn: The IMM musollah is located at 4th floor (segregated for men and women) (space for 1 imam and 3 ma'mum ) including dedicated room for ablution next to the toilets (keys available inside the musollah). Take the lift at lobby A next to the McDonalds on the ground floor.
Details: Sejadah, telekung, slippers, qurans available

LocationIn: Roof access from the staircase near the waiting area for shuttle service IMH-Hougang MRT. Beside Beijing Tong Ren Tang Science Arts Medical Clinic. Take staircase to roof access after level 2.
Details: No amenities available. Ablution to be done at the nearby toilet at Level 2 beside Nursing Administration Office.

LocationIn: Level 3. Lift lobby A.
East Wing (Office Tower) 11th floor, exit from lift turn right and make as sharp right turn. Walk straits to the end of the corridor till you see #11-60 /61 /62 (mussollah is at Sazali Sarwan Rm 2)
Details: slippers / sejadah / ladies telekung are available. Pls do not lock the prayer room after finished doing your solat.

LocationIn: Toko Warisan Bookstore level 2.
Details: 2 separate rooms. Only Prayer Mats & qiblat directions are available. Able to hold 1 person per room at a time.

LocationIn: 1st Floor, Staircase 2 (behind front reception), area under staircase
Details: Prayer mats and qiblat direction provided.  Use toilet nearby.

LocationIn: Next to Skecher's shop at 1st floor. Got to walk till the end.
Details: Ablution use at the cleaner store. Only one solat mat available.

LocationIn: Basement 1 in the campus, near to bookshop and printing services.
Details: Everything is available and the toilets is just beside the Musollah.

LocationIn: Located at the staircase on level 1 next to Himawari Japanese Restaurant. The little area is secured with curtain for privacy.
Details: Handicap toilet is right outside the musollah. Sejadah, Telekong, Kain Pelekat, Attar, Slippers are available. Area is equipped with light, fan and a mirror.

Address: 151 Lorong Chuan, New Tech Park, Singapore 556741
LocationIn: Lobby F entrace. To the right side of the lift open the stairs door. The Musollah is on the righ side.
Details: Capacity 15~20 person. Wudu can be done in the toilet adjacent to musollah. Everything is available including Quran to read.

LocationIn: Musollah is located beside Texas Chicken at the Supertree Dining area. There's a small room with a white door which states 'Mushollah'. Prayer room can fit up to 4 - 5 people.
Details:
There are a few prayer mats available. Slippers are provided for ablution. Qiblat direction are pasted at the corner, pointing to the Qiblat direction. A copy of Singapore prayers timings are also available in the musollah.

Ablution area have to be taken at nearest toilet located at the Supertree Dining area

LocationIn: Located at Basement Carpark near to starcase L. Face the door of Staircase L and turn right and you'll find the male and female prayer room.
Details: The only problem is that the female prayer room is locked most of the time. The male prayer room is fine. Ablution for males and ladies is located inside the prayer room. Prayer mats are provided.

Address:
8 Changi Business Park Avenue 1 
(S)486018
1st floor Lobby
LocationIn: Lobby of South Tower. Signs around buildings directing to prayer room. Enter lobby down from NTUC Xtra supermarket door on left before elevators.
Details: Prayer mats, qiblat direction and slippers provided. Shared room for men and women. Ablution can be taken at nearby toilet/restroom.

Place: Singapore University of Technology and Design
LocationIn: Building 2, Lobby E, Basement floor. When stepping out of the lift lobby, turn right. There will be two doors. The musollah is the second door.
Details: Ablution area is outside of the musollah to your right. Prayer mats, attire and qiblat directions are all available.

LocationIn:
Take lift to either Level 7 or Level R,
Musollah located at the top of each staircase within the building.
Segregated by gender.
Level R (Top Floor), Stairs 1 - Muslimin
Level R (Top Floor), Stairs 3 - Muslimah
Level 7, Stairs 2 - Muslimah
Details:
Prayer mats, telekong, slippers available.
To take ablution in nearest toilet. (Level 7)

LocationIn:
LEVEL B3 (below escalator leading to Four Fingers #B2-02)
- An empty space that is not crowded.
- Walk towards Four Fingers and take nearby lift down to B3.
Details:
- Wuduk can be taken at the toilet at the same level (i.e. B3)
- Bring your own cprayer mats, attire, compass.

Address: Raffles Hospital, 585 North Bridge Road Singapore 188770
LocationIn: Level 9
Details: Ward with the label 'Musollah Room' outside, shared space but with curtains to separate male and female. Toilet in the room. Everything provided inside.

LocationIn: Near toilets next to NTUC supermarket. Enter corridor leading to toilets and look out for an exit door before reaching the toilets.
Details: Prayer mats and a few sarong pelikat available. Qiblat indicated by a small sign placed near the prayer mat rack. Take ablution at the toilets nearby, where some cubicles have hand bidets.

LocationIn:
Level 2 carpark
Take the carpark lift to level 2, walk to the closest exit, turn right. 
The prayer area is located on the other end.
Details: Ablution area on the side, prayer area has prayer mats

Address: 10 Pasir Panjang Road, Mapletree Business City Singapore 117438
LocationIn: 20 East, Behind the service lift lobby
